verbose_text: Four major enzyme reactions were considered (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) : (i) autophosphorylation and dephosphorylation of PhoR, (ii) phosphotransfer from PhoR ~ P to PhoB, (iii) dephosphorylation of PhoB ~ P by PhoR and (iv) autodephosphorylation of PhoB ~ P. Autophosphorylation of PhoR was approximated with first order kinetics considering that the cellular ATP concentration is in large excess.
